Edvard Grieg

Twenty-three short Pieces, EG 104

1858–1859

[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2] · [IMSLP page 3]

Grieg left three closely-related sets of pieces: the three pieces (EG 102), nine children’s pieces (EG 103) and twenty-three short pieces (EG 104). The contents of the first two sets are all repeated, with only slight changes, in the third set.
